translations: n.[植保] 蝗虫，[昆] 蚱蜢

sentences.sentence: There were millions of locusts around us—a locust sandstorm.
sentences.translation: 我们周围有数百万只蝗虫—— 一场蝗虫风暴。

sentences.sentence: The project involves transferring the skills of the 15, 000 household locust farmers in Thailand across the border.
sentences.translation: 这个项目涉及到转变跨边界的泰国境内15000名家庭蝗虫养殖者的技能。

sentences.sentence: On a visit to an insect farm, she greedily peels the wings and legs off a freeze-dried locust and crunches down with gusto.
sentences.translation: 在她参观一家昆虫农场时，她贪婪地剥下一只冻干的蝗虫的翅膀和腿，然后兴奋地吞下了肚。
